name: snuffling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
snuffle
[ I or T ] to breathe in quickly and repeatedly through the nose, usually because you are crying or because you have a cold: He was snuffling and blowing his nose. Synonym
sniffle
[ I usually + adv/prep ] (of an animal) to breathe in quickly and repeatedly through the nose while smelling something: The dog snuffled around and began digging at the base of the tree.
